subject: Re: [junit] Re: Future of JUnit & Hamcrest
msgSnippet: ... Correction: It seems that syncing your own repository to Maven Central is not anymore the preferred process, so that isn t anymore an option. :) Sonetype
messageBody:
On Wed, Aug 18, 2010 at 4:37 PM, Esko Luontola <esko.luontola@...>wrote:

> I think that using Sonetype is easier than directly submitting to Maven
> Central (
> http://maven.apache.org/guides/mini/guide-central-repository-upload.html),
>

Correction: It seems that syncing your own repository to Maven Central is
not anymore the preferred process, so that isn't anymore an option. :)
Sonetype appears to be the only accepted forge which is open for all OSS
projects.

(The last time I read that page was a couple of years ago, so I should have
checked it for updates before posting.)

--
Esko Luontola
www.orfjackal.net
